citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:35pm on May 20,
2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee, but the facility address is now under new ownership with no
forwarding address for the licensee. The phone number on file for the licensee is also no longer assigned to the licensee.
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:35pm on May 20, 
2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee, but the facility address is now under new ownership with no 
forwarding address for the licensee. The phone number on file for the licensee is also no longer assigned to the licensee. 
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and 
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
